CustomField.description: created to calculate when renewal quote will be created - BIZ-46128
CustomField.formula: IF( Text(Subsidiary__c) = "18:DealCloud, Inc." && Text(Contract_Master_Terms__c) = "Legacy DealCloud Agreement" , 30, IF( Text(Subsidiary__c) = "18:DealCloud, Inc." && Text(Contract_Master_Terms__c) <> "Legacy DealCloud Agreement",60, 90))
CustomField.label: Renewal to be created Before (Days)
